nodes.text: The Trulalis system, also known as the Issor system, was a star system located within the Outer Rim Territories. It was the Arkanis sector's economic engine and home of all legal trade in the sector. It contained three productive worlds. Issor and Cadezia were industrialized planets. Trulalis was home to a widely regarded university that attracted students from surrounding sectors.

The Trulalis system was first mentioned in The Final Exit, published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 4. The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia also states Trulalis as being a part of the Trulalis system. However, The Essential Atlas gave the name of the system as the Issor system.
